scripts.logs: pm2 monit hotline && echo "⁉️ Just run 'npm run stop' when you want to stop the server"
scripts.http: cross-env PROTOCOL=http pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --watch && npm run logs
scripts.https: cross-env PROTOCOL=https pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --watch && npm run logs
scripts.http:cluster: cross-env PROTOCOL=http pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --watch --env cluster --update-env && npm run logs
scripts.https:cluster: cross-env PROTOCOL=https pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --watch --env cluster --update-env && npm run logs
